results.title: Metformin reduces bone resorption in apical periodontitis through regulation of osteoblast and osteoclast differentiation.
results.text_hl: INTRODUCTION: We have previously demonstrated that auxiliary @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ therapy promotes healing of @<m>DISEASE_Periapical_Periodontitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010485 @@@apical periodontitis@@@.

results.title: Metformin attenuates alveolar bone destruction in mice with apical periodontitis and inhibits pro-inflammatory cytokine synthesis in lipopolysaccharide-stimulated RAW264.7 through the AMPK-mTOR-NF-kappaB pathway.
results.text_hl: Findings from this study show that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ has therapeutic potential in @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ @DISEASE_Bone_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D001847 @@@bone destruction@@@, such as @<m>DISEASE_Periapical_Periodontitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010485 @@@apical periodontitis@@@.
